additionalInfo:
Hello and welcome to my webpage! I am a recent graduate with a Bachelor of Science degree in Software Engineering from Drexel University, passionate about solving complex problems through innovative technology. My journey in software development has given me hands-on experience in building scalable and dynamic web applications using React, where I focus on creating responsive and interactive user interfaces.

I thrive on leveraging Reactâ€™s component-based architecture to develop maintainable and performant applications, ensuring that each project I work on provides a seamless user experience. From managing states to optimizing rendering performance, I am committed to writing clean, efficient, and reusable code that enhances usability.

In my work, I focus on building efficient and secure solutions. I actively use GitHub to manage my code repositories, collaborate with team members, and track progress through version control. This ensures efficient development workflows and allows for smooth collaboration across different stages of a project. My expertise also extends to securing infrastructure through advanced network configurations, ensuring optimal performance and resilience.

In addition to my technical skills in React, I have a strong foundation in cloud technologies like AWS and Azure, as well as database management and optimization. I am proficient in tools such as Kubernetes for maintaining robust environments and CircleCI for continuous integration. I am also well-versed in security protocols and best practices for developing scalable applications. With this broad technical expertise, I am eager to contribute to and grow alongside a forward-thinking team, solving complex problems and delivering impactful solutions.
